title: Probabilistic Results on the Architecture of Mathematical Reasoning Aligned by Cognitive Alternation. (arXiv:2308.08714v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: We envision a machine capable of solving mathematical problems. Dividing the quantitative reasoning system into two parts: thought processes and cognitive processes, we provide probabilistic descriptions of the architecture.
context:
Title: Probabilistic Results on the Architecture of Mathematical Reasoning Aligned by Cognitive Alternation. (arXiv:2308.08714v1 [cs.AI])
Abstract: We envision a machine capable of solving mathematical problems. Dividing the quantitative reasoning system into two parts: thought processes and cognitive processes, we provide probabilistic descriptions of the architecture.
translated_title: 数学推理的架构的概率性结果与认知交替（arXiv:2308.08714v1[cs.AI]）
translated_abstract: 我们设想一台能够解决数学问题的机器。将定量推理系统分为思维过程和认知过程两部分，我们提供了架构的概率性描述。
tldr: 该论文研究了一种能够解决数学问题的机器，将定量推理系统分为思维过程和认知过程两部分，并提供了架构的概率性描述。
en_tdlr: This paper investigates a machine capable of solving mathematical problems by dividing the quantitative reasoning system into thought processes and cognitive processes, and provides probabilistic descriptions of the architecture.
